messages.subject: JapanEx
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone Just to remind you that the Japan Ex show is at the Excel Centre in London s docklands this weekend. I will have a display of swords there, a few
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone
Just to remind you that the Japan Ex show is at the Excel Centre in London's docklands this weekend. I will have a display of swords there, a few for sale, so please say hello if you come.
Regards
Clive Sinclaire

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
